segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite busy with activity, laid out as a line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My attention is immediately drawn to the sink area on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The single-basin sink is dramatically overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is actively running from the faucet and pouring over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a continuous sheet, streaming down the cabinet doors and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands in front of the sink, seemingly oblivious to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate with a dish towel, her focus completely on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is already submerged in the widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, her expression remains utterly neutral; she shows no sign of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s astounding how she can be so absorbed in her task while this happens around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of her slipping on that wet floor makes me incredibly uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness is almost heartbreaking to witness, given the impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
